Trouble Getting Techs
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Trouble Getting Techs
By bummerluck on Thursday, May 30, 2013 - 10:19 am:

I posted this on the gamefaqs board, but I hardly got replies.. so I hope I can get more replies here for my particular problem. Here goes.

Throughout my time playing this game, I've had some trouble getting some techs of some specific monsters. I'm a move collector, so this is rather infuriating for me. I know that some techs are already identified as glitched for some monsters, but I believe the techs I'm about to list are either undiscovered glitches themselves, or I just actually suck at getting techs. Anyway, onwards to dem techs..

Golem - Giant Chop (sharp tech, but the Papas won't give it to me)

Beaclon - Frantic Horn (apparently a chain tech with Horn Cannon being the pre-requesite, but I'm sure I've used Horn Cannon over a bazillion times, and still no Frantic Horn..)

Centaur - Death Thrust (I've heard that only Centaur/Jokers can learn this, but I still get that "It'll be difficult to learn this technique" message for the Mandy errantry with both my Centaur/Durahan and Centaur/Pixie being evil as much as possible..)

Wracky - Wracky Combo, Twister Slash (I think the Twister Slash is chained with Spin Slash as the pre-req, still can't get it though after mass-spamming Spin Slash ;Wracky Combo, I'm stumped)

Phoenix - Flame Cannon (this one's known to be an evil tech, the trouble for me is that I simply cannot seem to turn a Phoenix evil)

I guess the only problem for me overall is that I probably have not experimented enough with nature levels or taken a more accurate track of the number of times I use techs for tech chains. I'm just curious though if anyone has ever had their monsters learn the particular techs I've listed above.

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, May 30, 2013 - 11:00 am:

I am super-busy today through Saturday, but, I will try going through some of my saves and saves I have from other people. Have you looked at the tourney entrants at Legend Cup? IIRC, Fenrick posted the monster techs along with stats.

By bummerluck on Thursday, May 30, 2013 - 11:58 am:

I've actually downloaded Fenrick's saves and manually looked through the monsters. The only one of interest is the Golem/Wracky, and it doesn't have the Giant Chop tech. He has a phoenix too, but the issue of it learning Flame Cannon doesn't bug me too much. Just chalkin' it up as a nature problem.

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, May 30, 2013 - 08:00 pm:

I haven't seriously raised any of these types, so, none of my saves will be of use. I'll see if I have saves that Fenrick didn't make public. People to ask, would include mepersoner and hengersrock because they ran another set of tourneys. And, I am trying to recall who ran the Tank War...

By bummerluck on Friday, May 31, 2013 - 12:54 am:

Thank you, Lisa.

Actually, I have another Wracky tech to list: Fire Juggler

I know it says on the tech list for Wracky that it can only be learned by the Dragon sub, but I'm wondering if there's a possibility that other sub-breeds of Wracky can learn it? I raised a Wracky/Joker who still has at least one tech locked for the Kawrea expedition. I'm wondering if maybe it's actually two techs, with Fire Juggler being locked along with Wracky Combo. It's at the end of it's life, so I can't really use Flame a few more times to see if it possibly unlocks Fire Juggler.

I'm currently raising a Wracky/Pixie to test this. Thanks again for all the help in advance.

By bummerluck on Sunday, June 2, 2013 - 06:37 pm:

Another Wracky-related post. I just got my Wracky/Pixie to learn Twister Slash. It seems that you need to have a Wracky at a best nature as well as use Spin Slash 50 times. I failed to have my Wracky/Joker learn the tech because it's nature could only go up as high as 'Good'. Mystery solved on one tech, I suppose..
